messages.zh: 第二关（前）
messages.en: Stage 2 (Before)

messages.zh: 唔嗯。
messages.en: Well, well.

messages.zh: 这就是传闻中的罗德岛啊，感觉确实是个充满了谜团的地方。
messages.en: This is the rumoured Rhodes Island. It does indeed feels like a place of mystery.

messages.zh: 空气中还夹杂着一股非常熟悉的气息。嗯......
messages.en: There is a very familiar smell in the air too. Hmm...

messages.zh: 要不是真的登上这艘载具，我还以为自己依然呆在海边呢。
messages.en: If I hadn't been on board here myself, I would have thought I was still at the beach.

messages.zh: 这里近期确实接待过几个阿戈尔人。
messages.en: There have been a few Aegir people here recently.

messages.zh: 你也是阿戈尔的访客，但我没在访客名单上看到你的名字。我也许没法接待你。
messages.en: You are also an Aegir guest, but I didn't see your name on the visitor list. I may not be able to welcome you.

messages.zh: 啊啊，抱歉抱歉，不过不劳烦你了，我说点事就走，不会在这里呆太久的。
messages.en: Ahh, I'm really sorry about that, but I won't bother you for much longer. I'll just say my piece and take my leave.

messages.zh: 咦，你居然还知道我的名字？
messages.en: Eh, you actually know my name?

messages.zh: 这几天会待在汐斯塔一带的人，没有人不知道你的名字。
messages.en: Those who stayed in Siesta city these few days would know of your name.

messages.zh: 虽然我并没有去，但我也早有耳闻。日落即逝的贝斯手Alty女士，罗德岛不是个可以随意进出的地方。
messages.en: While I didn't go there myself, but I heard about it. It's not like Rhodes Island is a place you can get in and out of, Ms. Alty, Alive Until Sunset bass player.

messages.zh: 啊呀，唉，不要那么有敌意啊。毕竟我们有很多共同话题，对吧，比如说还能看到星星的时候？
messages.en: Aiyah, Erm, please don't be so hostile. After all, we have a lot in common, don't we, like when we could still see the stars?

messages.zh: ——请坐。
messages.en: ——Take a seat.

messages.zh: 谢谢。你肯定会好奇我是怎么进来的吧？
messages.en: Thank you. You must be wondering how I got in here?

messages.zh: 这不重要的，你不用担心罗德岛的安保设施有什么漏洞，单纯是我运气好罢了。
messages.en: That's not important. You don't have to worry about any security holes in Rhodes Island. I just happen to be lucky this time.

messages.zh: 话语掩盖不了你的实力。请放心，我不怎么担忧，至少它只会对重要的访客网开一面。
messages.en: Words cannot hide your true strength. Rest assured however, I'm not worry, at least the security will only open to important visitors.

messages.zh: 不过，一位音乐巨星是怎么对这狭小的病房产生兴趣的？
messages.en: But how did a music superstar became interested in our cramped patient room?

messages.zh: 如果是想和你的阿戈尔朋友叙旧，你可能走错房间了。
messages.en: If you want to catch up with your Aegir friends, you may be in the wrong room for that.

messages.zh: 朋友？嗯......谈不上吧？不，该说，离朋友有点远呢......
messages.en: Friend? Erm... not really? No, it's a little far from a friend...

messages.zh: 其实我是来找你的。或者说，是来看看你的。
messages.en: Actually, I'm here to see you. Or rather, to take a look at you.

messages.zh: 很抱歉，我不认识你，我也不是动物园的展品。
messages.en: I'm sorry, I don't know you, and I'm not a zoo exhibit.

messages.zh: 阿戈尔人的传闻，我从Frost那里听说了很多。她很少讲故事的，但那次她说了很多。
messages.en: I heard much from Frost about the Aegir. She seldom tells stories, but she said a lot on that one occasion.

messages.zh: 我没兴趣听你说些你朋友的奇异冒险故事......
messages.en: I'm not interested in hearing about your friend's strange adventures...

messages.zh: 那唱出来怎么样？
messages.en: How about singing it to you?

messages.zh: ......或是面目全非的有关我的逸闻。我希望你能更直接一点。
messages.en: ...Or unrecognizable anecdotes about me. I prefer you'd be more direct with me.

messages.zh: 有人告诉过我闲聊可以缓和气氛，我做的似乎不太成功......
messages.en: Someone told me that small talk can lighten the mood, but I don't seem to be doing it very well...

messages.zh: 那就开始吧。我其实有些讨厌他们阿戈尔人。当然我也知道，他们确实挺可怜的。
messages.en: Let's get started then. I actually kind of hate the Aegir. Of course I know about them, they are really pathetic.

messages.zh: 只是，如果没有你出现的话，这几个阿戈尔人可能都会沉入海底，被幽暗的海洋吞噬。
messages.en: But if you had not appeared, those few Aegir would have sunk to the bottom and be swallowed up by the dark sea.

messages.zh: 我并没有做什么重要的事情。
messages.en: I've done nothing important.

messages.zh: 你救了他们，而且这里就有好几个。
messages.en: You saved them, and there are several of them here.

messages.zh: 这些特别的阿戈尔人，他们一点都不尊敬你，明明你为他们做了这么多。
messages.en: Those special Aegirs, they don't respect you at all when you've already done so much for them.

messages.zh: 你平时是不是对他们太凶了？
messages.en: Are you usually too hard on them?

messages.zh: 我只是在阻止他们自取灭亡。
messages.en: I'm just trying to stop them from killing themselves.

messages.zh: 那也是种慈悲心的体现，医生。
messages.en: That's a sign of compassion, doctor.

messages.zh: 只不过，我的问题也就在这里。
messages.en: But there lies my problem.

messages.zh: 请说。
messages.en: Go ahead.

messages.zh: 你知道阿戈尔人的敌人是什么吗？
messages.en: Do you know what the Aegir enemies are?

messages.zh: 或者，你其实知道我的身份吧？
messages.en: Or do you know who I actually am?

messages.zh: Mon3tr，停下！
messages.en: Mon3tr, stop!

messages.zh: 你很年轻。
messages.en: You are very young.

messages.zh: 是的，我们很年轻，我们没有经历过那些悲伤的事情，所以我们还在这，还可以说话，还可以唱歌。
messages.en: Yeah, we're young, we haven't experienced all those sad things, so we're still here, we can talk, we can sing.

messages.zh: 深海猎人们在做他们应该做的事情。
messages.en: Deep sea hunters are doing what they're supposed to do.

messages.zh: 我明白，这些我都明白。只不过，我们也想知道答案。
messages.en: I know. I understand all of that. But we also seek answers.

messages.zh: 我们一点也不想和这些小家伙敌对。
messages.en: We don't want to antagonize these little guys at all.

messages.zh: Frost她啊，从小就只对音乐和食物这两样东西感兴趣。就连休息对她来说都是浪费时间。
messages.en: Frost, she, ah, only been interested in music and food since childhood. Even resting is a waste of time to her.

messages.zh: 这位朋友你可以等到我们真正会面了再介绍给我。
messages.en: This friend of yours can be introduced to me when we actually meet.

messages.zh: 对不起，我的老毛病又犯了......
messages.en: I'm sorry, my old habit is flaring up again...

messages.zh: 我信任医生你，以及你掌握着的真相。
messages.en: I trust you, doctor, and the truth you hold.

messages.zh: 我不认为你对真相的了解比我少。
messages.en: I don't think you know less about the truth than I do.

messages.zh: 不，只是我们有各自擅长的事情而已，比如说，我觉得你唱歌也许不会那么动听。
messages.en: No, it's just that we're good at different things, like, I don't think you can sing all that well.

messages.zh: 啊，嗯，只是举个例子！没有要冒犯你的意思。
messages.en: Ah, erm, it's just an example! No offense intended.

messages.zh: 但阿戈尔的平静，就像你知道的那样，只是个表面现象。
messages.en: But Aegir's calm, as you know, is only on the surface.

messages.zh: 大多数人对大海一无所知。
messages.en: Most people know nothing about the sea.

messages.zh: 大地的孩子又怎么会知道这些呢？对他们要求太高也不好。
messages.en: How would the children of the earth know such things? It's not good to expect much of them.

messages.zh: 只是，哪怕是这表面上的平静，可能也没法坚持太久了。欲望果然是可怕的东西。
messages.en: But even this apparent calm may not last long. Desire is a terrible thing.

messages.zh: 所以，我需要一些，嗯，信息。
messages.en: So, I need some, um, information.

messages.zh: 又是信息？
messages.en: Information again?

messages.zh: 是的。
messages.en: Yes.

messages.zh: 这么说......哦哦，原来对这些感兴趣的不止我一个啊，哈哈。
messages.en: You said information again... Oh, so I am not the only one who is interested in this, haha.

messages.zh: 我有些好奇，上一个人是谁呢？
messages.en: I'm a little curious, who was the last person who asked?

messages.zh: 是个阿戈尔人，也是个深海猎人。
messages.en: An Aegir, who was also a deep-sea hunter.

messages.zh: 那我们也许真的能做朋友呢，呼呼。
messages.en: Then maybe we could be friends, fufu.

messages.zh: 当然。我能理解你为什么来找我。
messages.en: Of course. I can understand why you came to me.

messages.zh: 活得越久，故事越多，伤痕越疼，脾气越差。
messages.en: The longer a person lives, the more stories they have, the more pain they feel, and so their temper worsens.

messages.zh: 抱歉，我不是想揭你的伤疤......
messages.en: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to dig up old scars.

messages.zh: 只是你确实不像其他人。他们会被过多的感情束缚、被言论利用，甚至变成某种灾难。
messages.en: It's just that you're not like everyone else. They are bound by too many emotion, easily manipulated by words, and may even become a disaster themselves.

messages.zh: 也难怪那个人让你作为最后的底牌来帮助小兔子和Dr.{@nickname}。
messages.en: No wonder that person let you become ace in the hole to help that small rabbit and Dr.{@nickname}.

messages.zh: 你其实是台X光机对吧？
messages.en: You're actually an X-ray machine, right?

messages.zh: 我也希望自己是台单纯的机器。
messages.en: I wish I was a simple machine, too.

messages.zh: 唔，不好意思，我其实只是想说，虽然你不会选择告知别人，但里面的东西，你其实已经全看到了吧？
messages.en: Well, I'm sorry, what I mean is that while you didn't choose to tell anyone else, but you saw the contents, didn't you?

messages.zh: 这个问题，我不能回答你。
messages.en: I will not answer this question.

messages.zh: 那就让我切入主题吧。这个问题你是可以回答的。
messages.en: Let me cut to the chase then. This next question is answerable to you.

messages.zh: 说吧，年轻的巨星。
messages.en: Go ahead, young superstar.

messages.zh: 啊，谢谢。
messages.en: Ah, thank you.

messages.zh: 请告诉我，你所知道的，关于那片海洋下发生的一切。
messages.en: Tell me what you know about what happened under that ocean.

messages.zh: 这不是一种信息。
messages.en: That's not an information.

messages.zh: 不，我说的是，“那片海洋”。
messages.en: No, I said, "That ocean."

messages.zh: Frost是我们中最年轻的。只有我们四个是年轻的。
messages.en: Frost is the youngest among us. Only the four of us are young.

messages.zh: 她嗅到那几个阿戈尔人的味道。那不是阿戈尔人应该有的味道。
messages.en: She smelled those Aegirs before. That's not a smell an Aegir should have.

messages.zh: “它们不能再歌唱。它们不能再说话。它们离我们越来越远。它们饥渴难当。”
messages.en: “They can no longer sing. They can't speak anymore. They're getting further and further away from us. They're becoming very hungry.”

messages.zh: AMa-10凯尔希医生，请你告诉我——这些特别的阿戈尔人，他们是怎么诞生的？
messages.en: AMa-10 Dr.Kal'tsit, please tell me -- these particular Aegirs, how were they born?
